c74object.name: zsa.dist
c74object.description: Calculates distance between lists and output the closest.

method.name: list
method.description:
In the left inlet: calculates the distance between the incoming list and those stored in
zsa.dist
memory, and output the index of the closest (based on the
mode
attribute) out the left outlet, and the list of all the distances out the middle outlet.
In the right inlet: stores the values at the specified index (the first element of the list is the index).

method.name: anything
method.description: In the right inlet: stores the values at the specified index (the first symbol of the message becomes the key).

method.name: (mouse)
method.description: Double-clicking on the object causes the Zsa Descriptors splash screen to appear. You'll find the version number and date there.

method.name: getkeys
method.description:
Outputs the keys out the
dumpout
outlet.

method.name: read
method.description:
The word
read
with no arguments puts up a standard Open Document dialog box for choosing a file to load into
zsa.dist
. If read is followed by a symbol filename argument, the named JSON file is located and loaded into
zsa.dist
.

method.name: write
method.description:
Calls up the standard Save As dialog box, enabling the user to save the contents of
zsa.dist
as a separate JSON file. If the word
write
is followed by a symbol, the contents of the
zsa.dist
are saved immediately in a file, using the symbol as the filename.

attribute.name: append
attribute.description:
When
append
is set, the list/message received at the right inlet is added to the
zsa.dist
memory without checking if the key already exists. This is useful to improve the performances when you store a lot of elements in
zsa.dist
.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: Sets the type of distance to calculate.

attribute.name: order
attribute.description:
When the
mode
attribute is set to
Minkowsky
, it defines the
order
of the distance calculation.

attribute.name: quiet
attribute.description:
When the
quiet
attribute is set, the keys are not automatically sent out the outlet when a new list/message is added to
zsa.dist
.
